00013         AsioFacade::AsioFacade()
00014         {
00015             _service = AsioService::make();
00016             _sessionRegistry = socket::SessionRegistry::make();
00017             _connector = socket::Connector_ptr(new AsioConnector(
00018                         _service, _sessionRegistry));
00019         }

00021         {
00022         }

00029         void AsioFacade::setWorkerThreads(unsigned numberOfWorkerThreads,
00030                                                 allEventsHandler_t allEventsHandler)
00031         {
00032             setWorkerThreads(numberOfWorkerThreads, defaultWorkerThreadHandler, allEventsHandler);
00033         }
00034 
00035         void AsioFacade::setWorkerThreads(unsigned numberOfWorkerThreads,
00036                                                 workerThread_t workerThreadHandler,
00037                                                 allEventsHandler_t allEventsHandler)
00038         {
00039             _allEventsHandler = allEventsHandler;
00040             _sessionRegistry->setAllEventsHandler(
00041                 boost::bind(allEventsHandler, shared_from_this(), _1, _2));
00042             for (unsigned x = 0; x < numberOfWorkerThreads; ++x)
00043             {
00044                 _worker_threads.create_thread(
00045                     boost::bind(workerThreadHandler, shared_from_this()));
00046             }
00047         }
00048 
00049         socket::Listener_ptr AsioFacade::listen(socket::Address_ptr address)
00050         {
00051             if(!_allEventsHandler)
00052             {
00053                 std::runtime_error("Can not create a listener without calling setWorkerThreads first.");
00054             }
00055             socket::Listener_ptr listener = boost::make_shared<AsioListener>(_service, _sessionRegistry);
00056             listener->listen(address);
00057             saveListener(*address, listener);
00058             return listener;
00059         }
00060 
00061         socket::Session_ptr AsioFacade::connect(socket::Address_ptr address)
00062         {
00063             return _connector->connect(address);
00064         }

00076         void AsioFacade::joinAllWorkerThreads()
00077         {
00078             _worker_threads.join_all();
00079         }
00080 
00081         void AsioFacade::sendEvent(socket::Session_ptr session,
00082                                    event::Event_ptr event)
00083         {
00084             if(isLocalSession(session))
00085             {
00086                 invokeAllEventsHandler(session, event);
00087             } else
00088             {
00089                 session->sendEvent(event);
00090             }
00091         }
00092 
00093         void AsioFacade::invokeAllEventsHandler(socket::Session_ptr session,
00094                                                 event::Event_ptr event)
00095         {
00096             _allEventsHandler(shared_from_this(), session, event);
00097         }
00098 
00099         void AsioFacade::defaultWorkerThreadHandler(socket::Facade_ptr facade)
00100         {
00101             try
00102             {
00103                 facade->service()->run();
00104             }
00105             catch (boost::exception& e)
00106             {
00107                 std::cerr << "[" << boost::this_thread::get_id()
00108                           << "] Exception: " << boost::diagnostic_information(e)
00109                           << std::endl;
00110             }
00111             catch (std::exception& e)
00112             {
00113                 std::cerr << "[" << boost::this_thread::get_id()
00114                           << "] Exception: " << e.what() << std::endl;
00115             }
00116             facade->service()->stop(); // As soon as one worker fails, we abort all of them (good for debugging)
00117         }
00118     }
00119 }
